item.title: Squid Game's premium Finishing Move is broken in Black Ops 6 and Warzone - Sportskeeda
item.description:
Squid Game's Premium Finishing Move is broken in Black Ops 6 and Warzone

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Sportskeeda

The new Finishing Move, included with the Squid Game Premium Event Pass in Black Ops 6 and Warzone, is broken. The finisher, called 'Roped In,' fails to eliminate enemies despite the animation playing correctly.

  • The Roped In Finishing Move animation plays out as intended but does not eliminate opponents.
  • This issue persists in both Black Ops 6 and Warzone.
  • Players are frustrated as the game developers have not yet acknowledged the bug.
  • It costs players 1100 CP ($10) to access the Premium Event Pass to unlock this move.
"Its failure to work correctly has upset several people, especially those who paid for the Premium Pass."

In conclusion, the glitch in the Roped In Finishing Move raises concerns among players, particularly those who have invested money into the event pass.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 might be called iPhone 16E, to launch globally in the first half of 2025 - Kalinga TV
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 might be called iPhone 16E, to launch globally in the first half of 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Apple will be introducing its new iPhone, possibly named the iPhone 16E, in the first half of 2025. The device is rumored to launch by early April 2025, featuring significant upgrades over the previous models.

  • The upcoming iPhone is suggested to be called the iPhone 16E instead of the iPhone SE 4.
  • It will feature a larger 6.06-inch OLED display, a significant upgrade from the SE 3's 4.7-inch LCD.
  • Other upgrades include a Touch ID home button, an A18 chipset with 8GB of RAM, and a 48MP rear camera.
  • Pricing is expected to start around $500 in the US and between Rs 49,000 to Rs 54,000 in India.
“Most the information is based on leaks/rumours, more details will likely be teased soon.”

This anticipated launch is expected to bring notable enhancements to the SE series, making it more comparable to the latest iPhone 16 series.

item.title: GTA 6 set to break all records? Top market analyst firm predicts sales of Rockstar Games to reach $3 billion - Indiatimes.com
item.description:
GTA 6 Expected to Set Sales Records with Projections of $3 Billion

Publication Date: 2025 Source: ESPN

GTA 6, one of the most anticipated games, is predicted by market research firm DFC Intelligence to generate over $3 billion in sales within its first year.

  • DFC Intelligence forecasts GTA 6 will achieve milestone sales similar to GTA 5.
  • Initial sales are expected to surpass $1 billion through pre-orders alone.
  • The estimated total sales for the first year, ending in November 2026, is projected to be $2.2 billion.
“GTA 5's success across the last decade will lead to stronger initial sales when Rockstar finally launches GTA 6,” said DFC founder David Cole.

In conclusion, with a robust sales forecast and a strong legacy from its predecessor, GTA 6 is set to break the gaming industry's sales records.

item.title: Mercedes-AMG CLE 53 Coupe set for 2025 India launch: Check out design, features, performance and more - WION
item.description:
Mercedes-AMG CLE 53 Coupe Set for 2025 India Launch: Design, Features, and Performance

Publication Date: January 5, 2025

Source: Wion

The Mercedes-AMG CLE 53 Coupe, which was unveiled globally in December 2023, will make its Indian debut in 2025, featuring design updates and enhanced performance.

  • The car features a stylish new front design with a Panamericana grille and sleeker LED headlights.
  • Rear design changes include two-part LED taillights and a quad exhaust system.
  • Dimensions have increased, with a wider stance and larger optional wheels.
  • Interior tech includes a 12.3-inch driver display and an 11.9-inch MBUX touchscreen.
  • Performance powered by a 3.0-litre twin-turbocharged six-cylinder engine with a 48V mild-hybrid system.
  • Equipped with rear-wheel steering for improved handling.
“The coupe delivers a combined output of 443 bhp and 560 Nm of peak torque.”

Overall, the Mercedes-AMG CLE 53 Coupe promises to be a significant addition to the performance car market in India.

item.title: Samsung One UI 7 Stable Update: Everything you need to know about the major software update for your Galaxy - Sammy Fans
item.description:
Samsung One UI 7 Stable Update: Everything You Need to Know

Date: December 2024
Source: Sammy Fans

Samsung has announced the One UI 7, which is currently in the beta testing phase for the Galaxy S24 series. The stable update is anticipated to roll out in early 2025, promising a redesigned UI and enhanced features.

  • One UI 7 is based on Android 15 and is being beta tested.
  • The stable release is expected in the first quarter of 2025, likely in February.
  • Key features include a redesigned UI, AI enhancements, and improved security measures.
  • Eligible devices range from Galaxy S, Z, A, M, and F series to Galaxy Tabs.
"The One UI 7 beta version gives us a taste of what’s to come, but it is the stable update that will really prove if Samsung can make good on its promises for a more personalized, secure, and smooth user experience." - Robin, Tech Writer

Stay tuned for more updates and prepare for new features and improvements with One UI 7.

item.description:

Publication Date: January 2025, Source: Live Mint

This article outlines the best 5G smartphones available under ₹10,000 in January 2025, emphasizing their features, specifications, and battery life.

  • Moto G35 5G: 6.72-inch Full HD display, powered by UNISOC T760, 5,000mAh battery, 50MP camera.
  • Infinix Hot 50 5G: 6.7-inch HD display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300, 48MP camera, 5,000mAh battery.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro Leaks: Specs, Camera, Design, Price in India, All We Know So Far - Times Now
item.description:
iPhone 17 Pro Leaks: Specs, Camera, Design, Price in India

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Leaked details about the iPhone 17 Pro reveal potential design changes, upgraded A19 Pro chip, advanced camera features, and a September 2025 launch.

  • Expected return to aluminium body with a hybrid rear panel.
  • Upgraded A19 Pro chip with 12GB of RAM.
  • Narrow Dynamic Island and new facial recognition technology.
  • Improved display with anti-reflective coating.
  • 24MP front-facing camera as a major upgrade.
  • Expected price in India: Rs 1,19,900.
  • Anticipated launch in September 2025.
“The iPhone 17 Pro seems all set to redefine flagships.”

The iPhone 17 Pro is generating excitement with its expected upgrades, scheduled for launch in 2025, as Apple continues to innovate in the smartphone market.

item.title: Redmi Note 14 Series To Launch Alongside Redmi Watch 5, Buds 6 Pro: From Price To Specifications, Here's What We Know - ABP Live
item.description:
Redmi Note 14 Series To Launch Alongside Redmi Watch 5, Buds 6 Pro

Publication Date: January 3, 2025

Source: Xiaomi Announcement

The Redmi Note 14 series will make its global debut on January 10, 2025, alongside the Redmi Buds 6 Pro and Redmi Watch 5. This marks the series' expansion following its successful launch in India and China.

Key Points

  • Redmi Note 14 series debuted in India in December 2024.
  • Global launch set for January 10, 2025.
  • Pricing starts at CNY 1,199 for the base model of Redmi Note 14.
  • Notable specifications include a 200-megapixel camera and fast charging capabilities.
  • Redmi Buds 6 Pro offer up to 55dB ANC, priced starting at CNY 399.
  • Redmi Watch 5 features a 2.07-inch AMOLED display with a starting price of CNY 599.
— Xiaomi (@Xiaomi) January 3, 2025

This global introduction reinforces Xiaomi's commitment to expanding its flagship smartphone lineup and accompanying accessories.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Release Date, Price, Design, Cameras, Specs, All Latest Leaks Here - Times Now
item.description:

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Tech News Network

Samsung fans are excited for the Galaxy S25 Ultra, with leaks suggesting major upgrades over the Galaxy S24 Ultra.

  • Price: Expected to increase from Rs 1,29,999 due to new processor.
  • Launch Date: Anticipated announcement on January 22, 2025.
  • Design: Sleek design with titanium frame and 6.9-inch display.
  • Camera: Quad-camera with 200MP primary sensor, new 100MP Space Zoom feature.

The Galaxy S25 Ultra is set to be Samsung's flagship device with advanced features and improved battery life.

item.title: 5 reasons I prefer Samsung Gallery over Google Photos - Android Police
item.description:
5 Reasons to Prefer Samsung Gallery Over Google Photos

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Android Police

The article explores why the author prefers Samsung Gallery over Google Photos, highlighting features like speed, editing tools, privacy options, and integration with cloud services.

  • Integration with Secure Folder enhances privacy for media files.
  • Samsung Gallery shows superior performance and speed compared to Google Photos.
  • Offers a wide range of editing tools beyond basic functionalities.
  • Smooth integration with OneDrive for cloud storage and accessibility across devices.
  • Functions effectively without relying solely on cloud storage, allowing for local-first photo management.
“The choice comes down to personal preferences and priorities, but for me, Samsung Gallery wins with its feature-rich experience.”

If you're a Samsung user looking for an extensive gallery app, Samsung Gallery provides an optimal experience for managing visual memories.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for January 5: Win rewards and free gifts - The Times of India
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes for January 5: Win rewards and free gifts

Published on: January 5, 2023 | Source: Times of India

Players of Garena Free Fire MAX can redeem codes to receive various in-game rewards and gifts today. These codes offer players an opportunity to enhance their gaming experience without spending real money.

  • The redeem codes are valid for a limited time and can be used in the game to unlock exciting items.
  • Players are encouraged to redeem these codes quickly to avoid missing out.
  • The list of codes can vary and is released periodically, making it essential for players to stay updated.
“These codes are a great way for players to enjoy the game more fully,” said a spokesperson from Garena.

To conclude, players should take advantage of the current redeem codes to elevate their gameplay and enjoy free rewards.

item.title: 6 Best Camera Phones Under Rs 15000 In 2025 - Times Now
item.description:
6 Best Camera Phones Under Rs 15000 In 2025

Publication Date: Jan 5, 2025 | Source: Times Now

This article highlights the top six camera phones available for under Rs 15000 in 2025, detailing their features and pricing.

  • Vivo T3x: 50 MP main camera, 6.72-inch display, priced at Rs 12,249.
  • Poco M7 Pro: 50 MP main camera, 6.67-inch AMOLED display, priced at Rs 14,999.
  • Oppo K12x: 32 MP main camera, priced at Rs 12,999.
  • Motorola G45: 50 MP main camera, priced at Rs 10,999.
  • CMF Phone 1: 50 MP dual main camera, priced at Rs 14,490.
  • Samsung Galaxy F15: 50 MP main camera, priced at Rs 14,499.
The Vivo T3x boasts a main camera of 50 MP and features such as fast charging and a user-friendly interface.

The article provides a comprehensive overview for budget-conscious consumers looking to purchase a camera phone in 2025.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 Price Leaks Ahead Of Rumoured Launch This Year: Here’s What To Expect - Times Now
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 Price Leaks Ahead Of Rumoured Launch This Year: Here’s What To Expect

Published on: Not provided

Source: Not provided

Apple is reportedly gearing up to launch its next-generation iPhone SE 4, expected early this year. While the company hasn’t officially announced details, a wave of leaks and rumours has given Apple fans plenty to discuss.

  • The iPhone SE 4 is expected to come with a higher price tag compared to its predecessor.
  • A recent report suggests a price of over KRW 8,00,000 (around Rs 46,700) globally, likely under $500.
  • The design may resemble the iPhone 14, with a larger 6.1-inch OLED display and Face ID.
  • It is rumoured to feature Apple’s A18 chip, 8GB of RAM, and a 48MP camera.
  • The inclusion of a USB-C charging port and 5G connectivity with Apple's in-house modem is also expected.
  • In India, the price could approach Rs 49,900.
“Only time will tell if these upgrades are worth it in terms of the price hike when the device is finally released.”

The iPhone SE 4 promises significant enhancements, but a price increase raises questions on its affordability and value for budget-conscious consumers.

item.title: Poco X7, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Roundup: Check Full Specifications, Availability, and Expected Pricing - Gizbot
item.description:
Poco X7, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Roundup: Check Full Specifications, Availability, and Expected Pricing

Published: Sunday, January 5, 2025 - Source: Gizbot

The Poco X7 series is set to launch in India on January 9, 2025, featuring the Poco X7 and Poco X7 Pro models. The Poco X7 Pro will be a rebranded Redmi Turbo 4.

  • The launch event will be livestreamed on YouTube and mi.com starting at 5:30 PM IST.
  • Prices are expected to be under Rs 30,000 for the Poco X7 Pro and under Rs 25,000 for the Poco X7.
  • Poco X7 Pro specifications include MediaTek's Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC and a 50MP triple-camera setup.
  • Poco X7 rumored specs feature MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra, 5,110mAh battery, and 120Hz AMOLED display.
"The Poco X7 Pro is expected to debut with an impressive AnTuTu score exceeding 1.7 million points."

This launch is anticipated to stir interest in the mid-range smartphone market in India, especially among gamers and tech enthusiasts.

item.title: Here’s what you can get at India’s ₹100 crore addresses | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Luxury Living: Exploring India's ₹100 Crore Homes

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mint

In India, the dream of owning a home priced at over ₹100 crore reflects the aspirations of its billionaires, showcasing opulent features like sea-facing bedrooms and exclusive amenities.

  • 185 billionaires in India are pursuing luxurious homes costing over ₹100 crore.
  • Some properties feature 800-1200 sq. ft. sea-facing bedrooms in prime locations like Pali Hill, Mumbai.
  • Luxury amenities often include golf courses in courtyards and top-tier culinary services.
The final stage of Maslow’s hierarchy is self-actualization, achieved for some through exclusive real estate investments.

This trend exemplifies the rising demand for luxury real estate in India, reflecting both wealth and lifestyle aspirations among its elite.

This year could mark a major moment in gaming history with many highly anticipated releases slated for 2025, including the long-awaited Grand Theft Auto 6. Here's a look at the most exciting titles to look forward to.

  • Sid Meier’s Civilization VII - Release date: February 11
  • Assassin’s Creed Shadows - Release date: February 14
  • Tales of the Shire - Release date: March 25

  • Fable - Release date: TBC

  • Blade - Release date: TBC
  • Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra - Release date: TBC
  • Dune: Awakening - Release date: TBC
  • Mafia: The Old Country - Release date: TBC

“While fans still have trepidation about Rockstar’s current promised release date of 'summer 2025', most are hopeful that they'll get the game after waiting more than a decade.”

With strong lineups and innovative gameplay, these titles are set to shape the gaming landscape in 2025.

item.title: iPhone 16 Pro Max Price Cut: Grab it only under Rs 50,000 with amazing deals - Here's how - ET Now
item.description:
iPhone 16 Pro Max Price Cut: Grab it only under Rs 50,000 with amazing deals - Here's how?

Publication Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: ET Now

The iPhone 16 Plus, launched at the ‘It’s Glowtime’ event, is now accessible in India for under Rs 50,000 due to significant discounts available on Flipkart.

  • Originally priced at Rs 89,990, the 128GB variant can be bought for Rs 45,850 after discounts and exchange offers.
  • The deal includes an immediate 5% discount and additional exchange savings.
  • The iPhone 16 Plus features a 6.7-inch display, 48MP camera, and is powered by the A18 Bionic chip.
  • Apple Intelligence enhances user experience with advanced features across apps.
“With powerful performance, a stunning display, an incredible camera, and innovative features, the iPhone 16 Plus offers an unbeatable package.”

This price cut presents a fantastic opportunity for consumers looking to switch to a premium smartphone at an affordable price.
